00035 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00036                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00037 {
00038     // Check the number of arguments
00039     if (nrhs<7 || ((nrhs%2)!=1) || nlhs>1)
00040         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00041     
00042     // Argument vector
00043     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00044     
00045     Mat cameraMatrix1(rhs[0].toMat()), distCoeffs1(rhs[1].toMat());
00046     Mat cameraMatrix2(rhs[2].toMat()), distCoeffs2(rhs[3].toMat());
00047     Size imageSize(rhs[4].toSize());
00048     Mat R(rhs[5].toMat()), T(rhs[6].toMat());
00049     double alpha=-1;
00050     Size newImageSize(0,0);
00051     bool zeroDisparity=false;
00052     // Option processing
00053     for (int i=7; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00054         string key = rhs[i].toString();
00055         if (key=="Alpha")
00056             alpha = rhs[i+1].toDouble();
00057         else if (key=="NewImageSize")
00058             newImageSize = rhs[i+1].toSize();
00059         else if (key=="ZeroDisparity")
00060             zeroDisparity = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00061         else
00062             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00063     }
00064     int flags = ((zeroDisparity) ? CV_CALIB_ZERO_DISPARITY : 0);
00065     
00066     // Process
00067     Mat R1, R2, P1, P2, Q;
00068     Rect roi1, roi2;
00069     stereoRectify(cameraMatrix1, distCoeffs1, cameraMatrix2, distCoeffs2,
00070         imageSize, R, T, R1, R2, P1, P2, Q, flags, alpha, newImageSize,
00071         &roi1, &roi2);
00072     plhs[0] = valueStruct(R1, R2, P1, P2, Q, roi1, roi2);
00073 }
